Text:
No criticism of the torrent, just a comment on the movie. The 3D in this works but it doesn't ever pop out of the screen. She repeatedly points a baseball bat at the screen but it never looks like it's coming past the screen and like you could touch it. I watched the IMAX's 'Under the Sea' and at several points it felt like the fish and whatnot were extending six feet from the screen, right in your face. I wonder if there's a 3D porn out that's matched that quality, I'm hoping to find at least one porn like that. Is it out there somewhere? I don't know.

Anyhow, thanks for the torrent.
